# Range.classPrototype.step

<dl>
<dt> Instance of </dt><dd markdown="1">
 [`Function`]({{site.baseurl}}\built-ins\Function) 
</dd>
<dt> Return value </dt><dd markdown="1">
 `/*Number*/` 
</dd>
</dl>

### Description

Returns step of the range.

### Example

```js
console.write((0..2).step())
```

**Expected output**

```
1
```
